## ShippingDiscount interface

Defines an individual shipping discount. This discount can be applied to shipping.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ShippingDiscount 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [amount](./magento-api.shippingdiscount.amount.md) | [Money](./magento-api.money.md) | The amount of the discount |
